DIA_FieldRaiderSlayer_HelloSlayer_03_02: What do you mean? You don't recognize me?
DIA_FieldRaiderSlayer_HelloSlayer_03_03: I am the world-famous Field Raider Slayer!
DIA_FieldRaiderSlayer_HelloSlayer_03_06: I am the chosen one of Innos with only one mission! I must destroy all the field raiders of this world!
DIA_FieldRaiderSlayer_HelloSlayer_03_07: How come you haven't heard of me?
DIA_FieldRaiderSlayer_YouAreCrazy_03_02: There's nothing to believe in here!
DIA_FieldRaiderSlayer_YouAreCrazy_03_03: I am just the Field Raiders Slayer and I kill all the field raiders I meet!
DIA_FieldRaiderSlayer_Thanks_03_01: Thanks for the help my friend, but this is where our paths diverge.
DIA_FieldRaiderSlayer_Thanks_03_02: There are many more field raiders waiting for me. Farewell!
